title: 09/13 Fantasy Football Podcast: Buy Low, Most Added, HOU-CIN
description:
You need to make some trades? We'll tell you who to go after, but first we talk about our expectations for the entire ARI offense and whether David Johnson should be dropped (4:04), plus why Danny Amendola is underowned (12:10) ... Jamey has Marshawn Lynch as his #1 RB in standard this week! What!? Why? (22:51) ... HOU-CIN preview (30:00), then some trade talk to finish the show (37:28) with buy low and sell high candidates and some Grade the Trade (57:40) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
